As observed Gulf cooperation council ( GCC ) country , obesity sedentary lifestyle cornerstone development T2D . Additionally , consanguineous marriage Qatar contribute high prevalence . However , contribute factor genetic predisposition , systemic intra-renal hemodynamic disturbance , lead glomerulosclerosis . All know pathway explain complex pathophysiology behind DN . Even different variant gene describe major GWAS study little impact term risk prevention prognosis DN .
